description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) as identified by CVE-2024-30015:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates based on your operating system build from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Restart your system post-installation to ensure the updates are effectively applied.

**Details**:
- The applicable KB updates include: KB5037788, KB5037771, KB5037770, and KB5037768.
- For manual installation, you can find the update packages here:
   - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
   - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to one of the following builds: 10.0.22631.3593, 10.0.22621.3593, 10.0.22000.2960, 10.0.10240.20651.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
